description:
This is a short but comprehensive course that is designed for aspiring magazine and book authors that will act as a practical guide to getting published again and again. The course covers:
  • How you can break into print even if you've never published anything before
  • Where and how to find writer's guidelines for any publication
  • How to approach an editor and get noticed!
  • Exercises for sharpening your writing skills
  • What to do when you get the job
  • What to do with your published clips
  • How to build on your success for a career in writing
  • All the tricks and tips for finding your writing niche
  • How to find a market for your work
  • How to get paid for your work
  • Building a body of work that you can apply to other writing projects
  • Teach you how to write winning query letters that will get you the job!

You will learn from a seasoned author and editor exactly how to target your market, sell your ideas to editors and get paid and get your name in print!

You have Udemy's 30-day satisfaction guarantee, so you have nothing to lose and everything to gain from enrolling today.
title: How I Became a Nationally-Published Author & How You Can Too
